definitions: a fungal disease of ornamental and fruit trees, especially plum trees, resulting in silvery discoloration of the leaves.

notes.text: The fungus is Chondrostereum purpureum, family Stereaceae, class Hymenomycetes

shortDefinitions: fungal disease of ornamental and fruit trees resulting in silvery discoloration of leaves

definitions: silver that has been beaten into a very thin sheet, suitable for applying to surfaces as a decoration

examples.text: a layer of silver leaf gives it a metallic sheen

shortDefinitions: silver that has been beaten into very thin sheet
